current.contact_page_intro_text: For regular updates or if you have a query or comment, please fill in the form below.
current.contact_page_bottom_text: Please tell us if you would like to be contacted by email about goods and services we feel may be of interest to you. We will process your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy
current.about_page_intro_text: JOSEF SEIBEL is one of Europe's longest established shoe manufacturers. Built to the highest quality, JOSEF SEIBEL footwear offers the highest level of comfort for all day, everyday wear. Extensive, stylish ranges of shoes, boots and clogs for women and men are available through our retail stores and partners across the UK and Ireland.
current.about_josef_seibel_text: The JOSEF SEIBEL collection hosts a combination of top-quality materials and hand-crafted elements, designed with sustainability and the perfect fit in mind. Removable insoles, genuine hand stitching and lightweight soles all provide endless comfort in every JOSEF SEIBEL shoe. High aesthetic standards and modern design come together to create a comprehensive selection of beautifully versatile footwear.
current.about_romika_text: JOSEF SEIBEL GmbH is proud to be the licensee for Gerry Weber Footwear worldwide. The Gerry Weber collection is elegant and extraordinary, comfortable and lightweight, offering a wide selection of shoes and boots in a variety of materials ranging from plain smooth leather and suede to textured fabrics
current.about_gerry_webber_text: The Tizian collection is full of eye-catching statement pieces. Featuring metallic finishes and cowboy style pointed boots, perfectly combining modern design and comfort. Tizian boots offer unique styles, alongside high-quality soft leathers and supreme comfort.
current.standard_uk_delivery:
No promotional code, no minimum spend, just free UK delivery on all orders – even during the sales!

We aim to dispatch all orders within 2-5 working days* for standard orders, although most of our orders are dispatched a lot sooner.

We send products out by Royal Mail or TNT and delivery of your parcel should be attempted within 2 working days of despatch.

* ‘Working day’ means Monday-Friday, and as such we do not dispatch on weekends or Bank Holidays.
current.express_uk_delivery:
When you buy something online, you want to get it as soon as possible. With express delivery we can guarantee a dispatch window of 2-3 working days*.

If you provide email address when placing your order, we will even notify you of your one hour delivery slot when your order is dispatched!

Express delivery is charged at £2.99 and is available on all products; simply select the option at Checkout.

* Please note that because our couriers do not operate on weekends and Bank Holidays, we do not include them as working days for the purposes of our above dispatch promise. If you order on a weekend, we will class the Monday as the first working day.
current.next_day_uk_delivery:
Next day delivery is a guaranteed next working day service for orders placed before 4pm.

Orders placed after 4pm will be processed as soon as possible but may be dispatched the next working day.

Any orders placed at the weekend will not be dispatched until the Monday for Tuesday delivery.

Next day delivery is charged at £5.99 per item.
current.international_delivery: We do deliver overseas and the postage we charge can be found here. We offer delivery to a large list of countries, but unfortunately if your country is not listed then we do not currently dispatch there. If you would like more information about why your country does not appear on our list, please email us at service@josefseibel.co.uk. Orders placed outside of the EU will have any VAT removed at the point of checkout. Purchases for children’s shoes in the UK are not subject to VAT.
current.shipping_handling:
Large orders or heavier items will be sent via TNT and therefore a signature will be required.

Orders received before 15:00 will be dispatched the same day if a working day or the next working day if not. Weekends and Bank Holidays are not working days. All orders received after 15:00 will be dispatched the following working day.

All suspected missing deliveries must be reported in writing to us once 7 days has passed from your order being placed.

Email service@josefseibelandfriends.co.uk quoting your order reference. A refund or replacement order will only be offered once 28 days has elapsed from your order date.

Please note that we endeavour to check that the quality of all orders shipped meets the high standards that our customers expect. However we are unable to guarantee that shoes despatched will be 'box fresh' i.e. they may have been tried on by customers in one of our stores.

It is very rare for parcels to go missing, but please take note of the following terms:

We will not be able to enter a claim for lost products with Royal Mail until:

1. 15 working days have passed (for UK orders)

2. 20 working days have passed (for EU orders, excluding UK)

3. 25 working days have passed (for orders outside the EU)
current.returns_exchanges:
If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return it in its original unworn condition and packaging and we will refund the price paid for the product. This will not include postage costs.

Address: -

Returns Department,

Josef Seibel

Unit 2

Wylam Court, Off Telford Way

Stephenson Industrial Estate

Coalville

Leicestershire

LE67 3HP

Please ensure your name and address are clearly visible on the return.

If you require an exchange, please give us full details of your requirements.

We recommend that you obtain proof of delivery for your return as we are not liable for goods lost in transit.

Should you have a complaint or any comments, please do not hesitate to Contact Us.

settings.feature_collection_text: From equestrial style Chelsea ankle boots to waterproof sneakers and trainers, Romika has a superb collection of high-quality footwear in a wide range of styles for the autumn/winter season. Using a combination of materials and high-tech waterproof membrances to create a perfect synergy of practicality, comfort and style.

settings.text_content: Please sign up to our blogs for all the latest footwear trends, advice and news. We will process your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

settings.option_description:
Postage & packaging costs for standard deliveries within the U.K. are free of charge for all orders over £30. For all orders under £30, shipping will be charged at £4.00.

Orders received before 14.00pm will be dispatched the same day if a working day or the next working day if not. All orders received after 14.00 will be dispatched the following working day. We aim to dispatch all orders within 2-5 working days* for standard orders, although most of our orders are dispatched a lot sooner.

We send products out by Royal Mail or DHL and delivery of your parcel should be attempted within 2 -5 working days of despatch.

* ‘Working day’ means Monday-Friday, we do not dispatch on weekends or Bank Holidays.

With express delivery we can guarantee a same day dispatch window providing the order is placed before 2pm*.
Trusting you provide an email address and mobile number when placing your order, we will notify you of your delivery when your order is dispatched.
Express delivery is charged from £6.95 and is available on all products; simply select the option at Checkout.
* Please note that because our couriers do not operate on weekends and Bank Holidays, we do not include them as working days for the purposes of our above dispatch promise. If you order on a weekend, we will class the Monday as the first working day.

We offer delivery to a large list of countries, but unfortunately if your country is not listed then we do not currently dispatch there. If you would like more information about why your country does not appear on our list, please email us at enquiries@josefseibel.co.uk.
The shipping cost for your item(s) will be calculated as you progress through the checkout.  This will vary according to location and number of items selected.

Large orders or heavier items will be sent via DHL and will therefore a signature will be required. Orders received before 14:00 will be dispatched the same day if a working day or the next working day if not. Weekends and Bank Holidays are not working days. All orders received after 14:00 will be dispatched the following working day. All suspected missing deliveries must be reported in writing to us once 7 days has passed from your order being placed. Email enquiries@josefseibel.co.uk quoting your order reference. A refund or replacement order will only be offered once 28 days has elapsed from your order date. Please note that we endeavour to check that the quality of all orders shipped meets the high standards that our customers expect. However we are unable to guarantee that shoes despatched will be 'box fresh' i.e. they may have been tried on by customers in one of our stores. It is very rare for parcels to go missing, but please take note of the following terms: We will not be able to enter a claim for lost products with Royal Mail until: 1. 15 working days have passed (for UK orders) 2. 25 working days have passed (for orders outside the UK)

If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return it in its original unworn condition as it was received with all packaging (including the shoe box and protective tissue) and we will refund the price paid for the product. This will not include postage costs.
Address: JOSEF SEIBEL UK, Unit 2 Wylam Court, Off Telford Way, Coalville LE67 3HP. 
 
You must ensure your name and address are clearly visible on the return.
 
All returns shipped from outside the UK MUST be clearly labelled as “Returned Goods” and the appropriate forms completed. Failure to do this may result in import tax and charges imposed by the carrier being deducted from your refund. Once your goods are received a full refund will be processed for the cost of your goods. We recommend that you obtain proof of delivery for your return as we are not liable for goods lost in transit. Should you have a problem or any comments, please do not hesitate to contact us at enquiries@josefseibel.co.uk.
Postage & packaging costs for standard deliveries within the U.K. are free of charge for all orders over £30. For all orders under £30, shipping will be charged at £4.00.

Please note due to the COVID-19 crisis we have wavered the 28 days return policy.

For international parcels shipped from our warehouse, localised COVID-19 outbreaks may delay deliveries for up to 30 days.  We apologise for any inconvenience this may cause.

settings.title: About JOSEF SEIBEL Group
settings.content: JOSEF SEIBEL is one of Europe's longest established shoe manufacturers. Built to the highest quality, Josef Seibel footwear offers the highest level of comfort for all day, everyday wear. Extensive, stylish ranges of shoes, boots and clogs for women and men are available through our retail stores and partners across the UK and Ireland.

settings.content_1: JOSEF SEIBEL footwar is created using a combination of high quality materials and hand-crafted elements, designed with sustainability and the perfect fit in mind. Removable insoles, genuine hand stitching and lightweight soles all provide endless comfort in every pair. High aesthetic standards and modern design come together to create a comprehensive selection of beautifully versatile footwear.
settings.content_2: JOSEF SEIBEL is proud to be the licensee for Gerry Weber Footwear worldwide. The Gerry Weber collection is elegant and extraordinary, comfortable and lightweight, offering a wide selection of shoes and boots in a variety of materials ranging from plain smooth leather and suede to textured fabrics
settings.content_3: Our new brand Westland by JOSEF SEIBEL is a comprehensive collection of lightweight, flexible and superb fitting footwear. Westland by Josef Seibel is a superb collection of high-quality footwear in a wide range of styles for the autumn/winter season. Using a combination of materials and high-tech waterproof membranes to create a perfect synergy of practicality, comfort and style.

settings.heading_text:
See something you like? UK next day
delivery is free for all orders over £95.

Free and easy Returns & Exchanges within the UK.
There’s no charge to try.
Have questions? We’d love to help.

settings.feature_collection_text:
From earthy coppers to burnt chocolates, this time of year is full of rich hues and tones that our designers take inspiration from. Discover our Autumnal
range that will be launching on the store in the coming days.
